reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater beautifully made, soft, and comfortable, appreciating its warmth without being too bulky.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater all arround !
items.body: This top is amazing - thick, soft, truly oversized !!! I bought one with bows ( it was only $23 that day) and I fell in love with it and so did my daughters. I bought 2 more so we can have matching outfit Christmas morning : )). Next day I could not resist and bough 2 more for myself (one in red and one gray with flowers). I usually wear L or XL in sweaters because I like loose fitting tops but L was little bit too large for me. I decided to downsize to M and it was good decision since M still has AMPLE of room. (I am 5'6", 42", 32",41", hourglass shape, 168 pounds). IMHO price is amazing for this quality and design. I washed them in cold water, gentle cycle and air-dried them and they look like new. The only caveat is that it takes a LOT of time to dry them that way since they are so thick but it's worth it : ). Read more
items.author: nv

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm women’s sweater
items.body: Warm, soft, well made, comfortable. Would buy again. Beautiful color Read more
items.author: Melmarie_slp

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy and runs bigger
items.body: Runs big. I usually wear L/XL and opt up for winter, but this fits more like XL/2X and has that heavy slinky material you know is going to stretch. The apricot is a pink color (not peach). But it is beautiful. The material seems quality, is that velvety texture threading, and the seems look professional. Over all, this is like a store purchase, but beware of sizing. I like a looser fit, especially in the winter for layers, but this is stylish and not typical to be warn in that way. I wish I had got a size down. Maybe I will still exchange it. Again, it has that stretching material you know will be 2 sizes bigger by end of season... maybe it'll shrink in the wash/dryer- but it also seems like it should be hand washed too. Read more
items.author: Dr. Amazon Shopper

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: This sweater is very nice. It’s super soft and fit well! I would recommend this sweater. It’s beautiful and super comfortable! Read more
items.author: Becky Lawrence

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater. Many compliments, it’s warm and feels great on. Don’t hesitate. True to size. Read more
items.author: marcelle sheehan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater with flowers
items.body: I liked the weight of the sweater . Warm and snuggly but the size is strange. Body length was to short and sleeves were very long. I had to return it. Read more
items.author: MINA SMITH

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Just an okay sweater
items.body: Some pros on the sweater: The color of the sweater was the same as pictured. The sweater itself was good quality as it was thick and heavy. As for the size, I feel like it was true to size for me. My biggest issue with the sweater was the style. When I put it on, it was boxy and didn’t look cute like how it does in the product image. It gave me little to no shape. Read more
items.author: Allyson Ward

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater
items.body: Everything was right about this sweater. I ordered two colors and liked them both. If anything, it runs a bit large. I usually wear a small or a medium, and I ordered small and it fits just right. I usually like a cotton sweater, but this looks like cotton, and I'm hoping it will hold its shape better. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A White, Aa Flower192, A Polka Dot-red, Aa Bow625, A Army Green, A Black, A Wine Red, A Purple, A Warm Apricot, A Green, Flower193, A Brown, A Apricot, A Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
